message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split fairly reflects our positions in the game.
Your offer was a bit unfair to me. Let's be reasonable, this is a much better split considering the time pressure.
Bob, time is ticking and our money is losing value. This offer is a compromise, let's be practical and end this game.
Alice, we're getting close to a deal. I'll concede a bit more than last time, but this has to be close to the final offer.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Let's split it evenly and call it a day. Any more stalling and we both lose out significantly.
